column1: Smoque BBQ////Ate on their covid patio on a Sunday afternoon. Surprisingly wasn't very busy. Baby Back Ribs were absolutely delicious
column2: tender and with great crust. The two sauces were tasty and the beans were awesome. Mac and cheese was very creamy and good
column3: but a tiny portion. Cornbread was great as well. The only negative to me was the brisket
column4: it had a great smoke ring
column5: but was fairly dry. Overall a great place for bbq
